rooms.description: A spacious entrance with a foyer that adheres to Vastu principles by ensuring the main entrance faces east.
A well-lit living space with floor-to-ceiling windows that allow natural light, providing a welcoming atmosphere.
A comfortable dining area integrated with the living room for joint family gatherings.
Functional and efficiently designed kitchen with modern appliances, placed adjacent to dining area per Vastu guidelines.
A guest room designed for additional family members or guests with Vastu compliance in orientation.
A compact bathroom for guest convenience, ensuring privacy and proper ventilation.

openings.description: East-facing entrance door complying with Vastu to invite positive energy.
Floor-to-ceiling windows integrated into Living Room and Kitchen for ample natural light.
Provides access to the open patio area, ensuring a seamless connection with outdoor spaces.

service_corridor.description: A narrow service corridor ensuring efficient circulation within the ground floor.
